rules.text: Sensitive or adult material must be behind a content warning and marked as sensitive.
If possible, link to one of your existing social profiles so we can help prevent bots, spam, crypto bros, nazis, etc

Zero tolerance for spam - if you're simply here to promote a business or product and you're not themed attraction related you will be suspended without warning. If you are themed attraction related please be mindful of how others may view your posts.

Put your favorite attraction in your bio. If you don't, your account may be suspended. We're doing this to combat spam accounts.

New account signups please out this in the reason to join field.
